_header: A dear God have I deserved this / This dear destiny to dread
Note:
The refrain appears as a proverb in Rylands Lat. 394, f. 3v, pr. Pantin (1930)
XPantin, William A. “A Medieval Collection of Latin and English Proverbs…from Rylands Latin MS. 394.” Bulletin of the John Rylands Library 14 (1930): 81-114 (at p. 94)
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; complaints, lovers’
_description: To his mistress — seven 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘That ons was leffe lette neuer be lothe’
